text: Francisco Daniel Rivera Sánchez (15 October 1955 - 18 January 2021) was a Mexican Roman Catholic auxiliary bishop. Rivera Sánchez was born in Guadalajara, Jalisco. He became a priest in 1988. He was titular bishop of Aradi and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Mexico City from 2020 until his death in 2021. Rivera Sánchez died on 18 January 2021 from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico, aged 65.Francisco Daniel Rivera Sánchez ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Guadalajara
title: Francisco Daniel Rivera Sánchez
